Package com.csis3275.Group404Project.dao

Class expenseDAO

java.lang.Object
com.csis3275.Group404Project.dao.expenseDAO
@Component
public class expenseDAO
extends java.lang.Object
Executes various SQL queries to be used in the boot controller.

    expenseDAO​(javax.sql.DataSource dataSource)
    Gets the jdbc connection to h2.

  • Method Details

    • createExpense

      public boolean createExpense​(Expense expense, java.lang.String userName)
      Adds an entry to the list of expenses table.
      Parameters:
      expense - The expense to be added.
      userName - The user who is entering the expense.
      Returns:
      The query to create an expense.

    • getReportingExpenses

      public java.util.List<Expense> getReportingExpenses​(java.lang.String S_USER)
      Grabs the user and who they report from. This brings back comma seperate values into a list that get expenses based on the usernames in the list.
      Parameters:
      S_USER - The user to gets reports from.
      Returns:
      Redirects to the returning expenses page.

    • getExpensesByUserName

      public java.util.List<Expense> getExpensesByUserName​(java.lang.String USER)
      Gets a list of expenses made by the user.
      Parameters:
      USER - User who is logged in.
      Returns:
      Returns list of expenses.

    • getExpensesByUserNameAndExpenseType

      public java.util.List<Expense> getExpensesByUserNameAndExpenseType​(java.lang.String USER, java.lang.String EXPENSETYPE)
      Gets a list of certain expense type made by the user.
      Parameters:
      USER - User who is logged in.
      EXPENSETYPE - Expense type to filter.
      Returns:
      List of expenses.

    • getAllExpenses

      public java.util.List<Expense> getAllExpenses()
      Gets a list of everyone single expense in the database.
      Returns:
      List of expenses.

    • modifyStatus

      public boolean modifyStatus​(Expense expense)
      Finds and updated the status of an expense.
      Parameters:
      expense - The expense being modified.
      Returns:
      Executes query to update status of the expense.
